pages.title: Fire Bomb
pages.text: $(bold)The opposite of a fire-fighter!$() Stack nose->tail: ordinance_incendiary_warhead, ordinance_core, and either ordinance_fins or ordinance_thruster. Place horizontally with the warhead pointed at the burn zone.

pages.name: Layout
pages.text: Left to right = tail to nose. Start with fins or thruster (T), core (0) in the middle, warhead (H) at the nose.
